resources.string: Disable geotagging of your camera application to prevent interference
Show a popup with a thumbnail and a reverse geocoded address (if available) after geotagging a photo
Prefer less accurate locations with altitude information over more accurate locations without altitude information
Stop acquiring a location after a location with the selected accuracy has been acquired
Always stop acquiring a location after the selected time
Use the last known location if no location can be acquired and when the last known location is newer than the selected time
Tap to open the Android location settings
Marcel Bokhorst (M66B)\nTap for details (will start the browser)
